name: The Root of Evil
description:
You play as the Root of Evil. While unsuspecting pedestrians go out for their daily stroll, control your demonic roots with WASD to reach out and gobble them up! 

Win the game by eating everyone in the cemetery.

Lose the game if your health meter drops down to zero.

Be careful though! These people aren’t completely defenseless -  if spotted, people will chop your moving root off and you'll have to start back at the root of your tree. Too many chopped roots and you'll wither away!

  • Programming: Tim Kaufmann, Tim Ogunmakin, Inès Robin
  • 3D Art: Niccolò Temperanza, Stephen Nevin
  • Animation: Maria Robertson
  • UI: Inès Robin
  • Music: Stephanie Taylor
  • Design: Courtney Spivey
